name: Middle PHP Software engineer (Symfony)
description:
Requirements:

  • You have at least 2 years of work experience as PHP-developer

  • You have useful and practical experience with Symfony or any other PHP frameworks (Laravel, Yii, etc.)

  • You have good knowledge of MySQL: JOINs, indexes, etc.

  • You have practical experience with Docker

  • You have experience with Git

  • You have experience with unix command line

Nice to have:

  • You worked or want to work with AWS servicesYou know MongoDB, ElasticSearch and you havealready worked with it in a professional way

  • You are interested in working for a young and cool team, taking responsibility and bring things forward by yourself

As a member of our team, you will enjoy:

  • Collaborating with a motivated and highly professional team

  • The possibility of training and obtaining AWS Certificates

  • Performance review

  • Lack of bureaucracy

  • A modern business center located in Minsk, just a five-minute walk from the subway, or the option to work remotely

  • A flexible working schedule from 11:00 - 20:00 Minsk time, with remote work options

  • Regular corporate events to foster team spirit

  • Fresh fruits available in the office for a healthy work environment


    Join us!
